attributes.action: allow 500 constituents to remove a sitting MP via a vote of No Confidence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When a MP consistently ignores the wishes of their constituents in parlimentary debates, and votes according to their personal views, or that of the party, then following a declation of no confidence in that MP signed by 500 constituents, with their electoral registeration number listed for checking, the Party Leader should instruct that MP to resign immeadiately and stand for re-election.  An MP is elected by their constituents to  represent the views of their constituents, not blindly follow party policy, nor vote according to their personal preferences, against the wishes of their constituents.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
